pages.title: 知乎问答整理
pages.text: 感情女友一点都不粘人怎么办？结了婚你才懂的道理有哪些？在两性关系里男人真正需要的是什么？ 职场领导喜欢怎样的下属？怎么看一个人有没有领导力？工作后，你悟出什么职场道理？在社会中，人际关系真的比能力重要吗？应届生参加工作，什么事情越早知道越好？既然会做人、会来事、拉关系、搞帮派如此重要，那么能力、学力和努力还有意义吗？社会狠狠的教会过你什么？一个老实人怎么彻底改变自己，变得极有城府？「对人性有深刻的认识」是怎样炼成的？有哪些较为系统地研究人性的书籍？和同事相处最忌讳的是什么？ 成长生活有哪些残忍的真相？怎样做一个内心强大的人？你见过什么样的通透的人？有哪些应该坚持的好习惯？人到中年是种怎样的体验？有哪些你只能匿名说出来的秘密？有哪些是你慢慢想明白了的道理？穷人家的孩子，什么令你深感无力?如何让自己在为人处世上变得强势？为什么不能在最好的年纪选择安逸？成年人之间有哪些容易踩坑的潜规则?穷人变富的过程中，最大的阻碍是什么？为什么说「这个时代，寒门再难出贵子」？一个人优秀与否最根本的原因究竟是什么？有什么生活中的道理，是到 30 岁才明白的？为什么很多人辛劳一生，仍然生活在社会底层？一个人如果表达能力差、理解能力差，怎么改变？一个博士生接受怎样的训练是完整、全面的科研训练？努力了七年却依旧被中产阶级家庭子女完爆，我该如何调整心态？成都大学党委书记毛洪涛遗体已被找到，案件还有哪些值得关注的信息？ 收藏夹04-管理、领导与职场

posts.title: MT3DMS Guide
posts.text: Welcome to MODFLOW PARTOriginal Tutorial Guide!!!CHAPTER 1Introduction1.1 PURPOSE AND SCOPE 1.2 KEY FEATURES1.3 ORGANIZATION OF THE REPORTCHAPTER 2Fundamentals of Contaminant Transport Modeling2.1 GOVERNING EQUATIONS2.2 ADVECTION2.3 DISPERSION2.4 SINKS AND SOURCES2.5 CHEMICAL REACTIONS2.6 DUAL-DOMAIN MASS TRANSFER2.7 INITIAL CONDITIONS2.8 BOUNDARY CONDITIONSCHAPTER 3Overview of Solution Techniques3.1 INTRODUCTION3.2 THE STANDARD FINITE-DIFFERENCE METHOD3.3 THE THIRD-ORDER TVD METHOD3.4 MIXED EULERIAN-LAGRANGIAN METHODS3.5 SUMMARY OF AVAILABLE SOLUTION OPTIONSCHAPTER 4Numerical Implementation4.1 SPATIAL DISCRETIZATION4.2 TEMPORAL DISCRETIZATION4.3 IMPLEMENTATION OF THE FINITE DIFFERENCE METHOD4.4 IMPLEMENTATION OF THE THIRD-ORDER TVD METHOD4.5 IMPLEMENTATION OF THE EULERIAN-LAGRANGIAN METHODS4.6 MASS BUDGET CALCULATIONSCHAPTER 5Program Structure and Design5.1 OVERALL STRUCTURE5.2 MEMORY ALLOCATION5.3 INPUT STRUCTURE5.4 OUTPUT STRUCTURE5.5 COMPUTER PROGRAM DESCRIPTION (VERSION 3.5)CHAPTER 6Input Instructions6.1 GENERAL INFORMATION6.2 UNITS OF INPUT AND OUTPUT VARIABLES6.3 INTERFACE WITH THE FLOW MODEL6.4 INPUT INSTRUCTIONS FOR THE BASIC TRANSPORT PACKAGE6.5 INPUT INSTRUCTIONS FOR THE ADVECTION PACKAGE6.6 INPUT INSTRUCTIONS FOR THE DISPERSION PACKAGE6.7 INPUT INSTRUCTIONS FOR THE SINK & SOURCE MIXING PACKAGE6.8 INPUT INSTRUCTIONS FOR THE CHEMICAL REACTION PACKAGE6.9 INPUT INSTRUCTIONS FOR THE GENERALIZED CONJUGATE GRADIENT SOLVER PACKAGE6.10 START OF A SIMULATION RUN6.11 CONTINUATION OF A PREVIOUS SIMULATION RUNCHAPTER 7Benchmark Problems and Application Example7.1 ONE-DIMENSIONAL TRANSPORT IN A UNIFORM FLOW FIELD7.2 ONE-DIMENSIONAL TRANSPORT WITH NONLINEAR OR NONEQUILIBRIUM SORPTION7.3 TWO-DIMENSIONAL TRANSPORT IN A UNIFORM FLOW FIELD7.4 TWO-DIMENSIONAL TRANSPORT IN A DIAGONAL FLOW FIELD7.5 TWO-DIMENSIONAL TRANSPORT IN A RADIAL FLOW FIELD7.6 CONCENTRATION AT AN INJECTION/EXTRACTION WELL7.7 THREE-DIMENSIONAL TRANSPORT IN A UNIFORM FLOW FIELD7.8 TWO-DIMENSIONAL, VERTICAL TRANSPORT IN A HETEROGENEOUS AQUIFER7.9 A TWO-DIMENSIONAL APPLICATION EXAMPLE7.10 A THREE-DIMENSIONAL FIELD CASE STUDYAppendix A.Description of the Generalized Conjugated Gradient SolverB Computer Memory RequiremntsC Linking MT3DMS with a Flow ModelD post-processing programs
